item.name: Piercing Gaze of the Risen Nightmare

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Piercing Gaze of the Risen Nightmare

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Thorns of the Risen Nightmare

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,303 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call a member of the Goon Squad to attack your target for 10 sec. Gaining Bloodlust or a similar effect summons the whole crew.

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

name: Machine Gob's Iron Grin

spells.description:
Equip: Your harmful melee attacks and abilities have a chance to trigger the detonation mechanism, dealing up to 894,488 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.

Blast strength and radius may vary.

description: Advertised with the slogan 'Big bonk goes big boom!'

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 50%.
